pages.text: These berries remind you of $(item)Sweetberries$(). In contrast to those, however, these are rather dry.$(br)Can be eaten, but have an unpleasant consistency. Better than nothing, should things get tough.

Harvested by shearing a Sawblade Holly Bush. Can be used as a $(l:brewing/potion_workshop_reagents#prickly_bayleaf)Potion Reagent$() and in cooking.$(br2)$(italic)Clearly easier to digest cooked than raw...
